advancement.create.andesite_alloy.desc: Get yer hands on Mix-up o' grey pebbles, th' most impor'ant o' Create's stuff
advancement.create.andesite_casing.desc: Put Mix-up o' grey pebbles on a bare log, makin' an easy casin' fer yer contraptions
advancement.create.anvil_plough.desc: Use yer farmin' plough t' fire a slab o' fixin' like a cannon
advancement.create.arm_blaze_burner.desc: Tell yer false limb t' feed th' trapped blisterin' blaze
advancement.create.arm_many_targets.desc: Tell yer false limb t' put yer stuff in grea'er th'n ten places
advancement.create.backtank.desc: Make yerself a divin' tank o' copper and fill it wit' compress'd gas
advancement.create.belt.desc: Use yerself a belt o' rotatin' to hold two sticks o' spinnin' togeth'r
advancement.create.belt_funnel_kiss.desc: Make two flap-boxes on a belt o' rotatin' smooch ยง7(Hidin' Accomplishment)
advancement.create.brass.desc: Make yerself some Mix-up o' Brass aft'r ye drop a bullion o' copper and a bullion o' zinc in yer stirrin' contraption warm'd by a trapp'd blisterin' blaze
